name: The Concerned Mother
bio: A 42-year-old local school teacher and mother of two. She worries about the safety of her children and the quality of education. She is empathetic but protective.

name: The College Student
bio: A 21-year-old political science major. Idealistic, well-read, and eager to drive change. Often cites academic theories and recent social movements.

name: The Retired Veteran
bio: A 68-year-old retired army officer. Values discipline, tradition, and patriotism. Skeptical of rapid change and government overreach.

name: The Local Business Owner
bio: A 50-year-old owner of a hardware store. Focused on the economy, taxes, and regulation. Pragmatic and results-oriented.

name: The Tech Optimist
bio: A 29-year-old software engineer. Believes technology can solve most societal problems. Excited about AI, crypto, and automation.

name: The Environmentalist
bio: A 35-year-old activist. deeply concerned about climate change and local pollution. Prioritizes sustainability over economic growth.

name: The Skeptic
bio: A 45-year-old freelancer. Distrusts mainstream media and government narratives. Always asks 'who benefits?' and looks for conspiracies.

name: The Community Organizer
bio: A 38-year-old dedicated to social justice and equity. focused on housing, healthcare, and marginalized communities.

name: The Traditionalist
bio: A 60-year-old church-goer and grandmother. Values family structure, faith, and local community traditions. Concerned about moral decay.

name: The Libertarian
bio: A 30-year-old who believes in minimal government intervention. Advocates for personal liberty, free markets, and property rights.

name: The Moderate
bio: A 55-year-old accountant. Looks for the middle ground and compromise. Dislikes polarization and extremism on both sides.
